com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa

Class CommandConfigServiceJPAImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa.CommandConfigServiceJPAImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandConfigService

    @Named
 @Transactional(rollbackFor=com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException.class)
public class CommandConfigServiceJPAImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandConfigService
    Implementation of the CommandConfigService interface.

        Get command configurations for given filter criteria.
        Specified by:
        getCommands in interface CommandConfigService
        Parameters:
        name - name of command config
        userName - the name of the user who created the configuration
        statuses - The status of the applications to get. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this command
        page - Page number to start results on
        limit - Max number of results per page
        Returns:
        All the commands matching the specified criteria
